npc.generic.talk.1: On sunny days I like to go out and walk a lot.
npc.generic.follow.no: Sorry but I am busy right now.
npc.generic.quest.tame_monster.start:
Did you know that you can tame the monsters in this world?
You would need to setup a barn first and then just give them an item.

With that said I would like you to tame a monster.
npc.generic.quest.tame_monster.active:
You still need to tame a monster.
Some monsters prefer certain items more.
npc.generic.quest.tame_monster.end: I see you've successfully tamed a monster. Congrats!
npc.generic.like: Thanks %player% for the gift. I really like this.
quest/tame_monster.quest.runecraftory_de: I need you to tame a monster. Come see me.
